statements: UPDATE blockchain_data SET amount = 500.50, sender_address = 'Alice' WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE blockchain_data SET receiver_address = 'Bob', encrypted_data = 'Some encrypted message' WHERE transaction_id = 54321;
UPDATE blockchain_data SET sender_address = 'alice@example.com', amount = 1000.50 WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE blockchain_data SET receiver_address = 'bob@example.com', encrypted_data = 'ENCRYPTED_DATA_HERE' WHERE amount > 500 AND sender_address = 'alice@example.com';
UPDATE stakeholders SET private_key = 'new_private_key' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 500.00 WHERE id = 10;
UPDATE stakeholders SET private_key = 'new_private_key' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 500.00, timestamp = '2022-01-01 10:00:00' WHERE sender_id = 2 AND recipient_id = 3;
UPDATE Users SET password = 'newpassword123' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Transactions SET amount = 500.00 WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE Blockchains SET encryption_key = E'\xDEADBEEF' WHERE name = 'Bitcoin';
UPDATE Transactions SET sender = 'Alice', receiver = 'Bob', amount = 500.00 WHERE id = 1234;
UPDATE Blockchain_Users SET email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Blockchain_Transactions SET amount = 500.75, timestamp = '2022-11-30 15:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = 'a1b2c3d4-e5f6-4a2b-8c9d-0e1f2a3b4c5d';
UPDATE Blockchain_Users SET password = E'\xDEADBEEF' WHERE username = 'alice'
UPDATE Blockchain_Transactions SET amount = 100.00, timestamp = now() WHERE sender_id = '60d12eb0-8f85-4d88-b4a2-4a3f7ef10788'
UPDATE Transactions SET amount = 150.75 WHERE transaction_id = 1234;
UPDATE Blocks SET timestamp = '2022-01-01 10:00:00' WHERE block_id = 5678;
UPDATE Transactions SET amount = 1500.75 WHERE transaction_id = 10;
UPDATE Wallets SET balance = balance + 500.25 WHERE owner_name = 'John Doe';
